description: Assess web3 threats by analyzing tokens, NFTs, and wallet addresses. Detect potential rug pulls, flag known phishing sites, and evaluate address reputation across supported chains. Leverage built-in docs and chain coverage to streamline due diligence.

capabilities.name: rug_pull_detection
capabilities.description:
Detect potential rug pull risks for a token contract.
        
        Args:
            chain_id: Blockchain chain ID (e.g., "1" for Ethereum, "56" for BSC)
            address: Token contract address to analyze
            api_key: GoPlus Security API key

capabilities.name: phishing_site_detection
capabilities.description:
Check if a website is a known phishing site.
        
        Args:
            url: Website URL to check
            api_key: GoPlus Security API key

capabilities.name: nft_security_analysis
capabilities.description:
Analyze NFT contract security.
        
        Args:
            chain_id: Blockchain chain ID
            address: NFT contract address to analyze
            api_key: GoPlus Security API key

capabilities.name: address_security_analysis
capabilities.description:
Analyze address security and reputation.
        
        Args:
            address: Blockchain address to analyze
            api_key: GoPlus Security API key
